Introducing a time-saving add-on for Google Chrome that can help you take your business on Amazon.com, Amazon.ca, and Amazon.co.uk to new heights!

Whether you're dropshipping or performing retail arbitrage, this add-on allows you to search for items without Prime, so you can quickly find products that you can sell to make money without wading through pages of Amazon Prime shipping items.

This extension help find items on Amazon while reducing work time by 90%. Plus, you can easily turn off the filter when you're ready to shop for yourself with just a simple button. For added peace of mind, we offer a 2-day refund policy. Simply contact us at mychocolabe@gmail.com within 2 days of purchase with your order number, and we will process your refund.
